prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon with sleek blue wings and a silver underbelly.
Show me a legendary creature that soars through the skies with psychic powers.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elegance and power, featuring bright blue colors.
Generate a unique design for a blue and silver Pokemon that embodies speed.
Make a mythical Pokemon that has a streamlined body and sharp wings.
Design a powerful Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has a majestic appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it could control the winds with its psychic abilities.
